Public

    -Self:SELF.app_mouse_focus:UINTEGER_8
        The application has mouse coverage 0x01

Public

    -Self:SELF.app_input_focus:UINTEGER_8
        The application has input focus 0x02

Public

    -Self:SELF.app_active:UINTEGER_8
        The application is active 0x04

Public

    -Self:SELF.get_application_state:UINTEGER_8
        This function returns the current state of the application, which is a bitwise combination of , , and . If is set, then the user is able to see your application, otherwise it has been iconified or disabled.
